local_intent: Execute transfer-phase placement on red_plate: confirm detection, move above, align, place white_plate onto red_plate_center with gentle press, release, verify release, and retreat.
assumptions: red_plate is visible in the camera and detectable
pose key 'red_plate_center' corresponds to a valid place pose
gripper is operational and can open to 0.09m
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer-phase steps of GLOBAL_BT/GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: Detect red_plate, execute MoveAbove (matches LOCAL_ANNOTATION), approach and align, PlaceAt with gentle press, open gripper to release, verify object no longer in gripper, and retreat.
